field.name: summary
field.value: Move assertions about view sources from the DefaultViewEngineManager, to the ViewEngines themselves

field.name: description
field.value:
Currently the DefaultViewEngineManager is making assertions about finding view sources, both for the sake of assertion, and also to search for the desired ViewEngine for a given template without file extension.
That good if only for SoC.
But, this is also limiting featues in AspView (and also in other engines), Since the engine might not even need sources in order to process a template (in case of precompiled views assembly).
If we apply this patch, then AspView will be able to support "no view sources in deployment" and also "use precompiled views from another web project"
